hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "By Him in Whose Hands my life is, none of you will have faith till he loves me more than his father and his children

chapter.ara-name: باب حُبُّ الرَّسُولِ صلى الله عليه وسلم مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: To love the Messenger (Muhammad ﷺ) is a part of faith
